column1: Discuss the purpose and objectives of the college fest.
Form an organizing committee comprising staff and faculty members.
Decide on the theme, dates, and duration of the fest.
Allocate responsibilities for various aspects, such as decorations, logistics, and event management.
Discuss the budget and explore potential sponsorship opportunities.
Review the current curriculum and identify areas for improvement or updates.
Discuss feedback from faculty and students regarding the effectiveness of courses.
Identify courses or topics that need revision or additional resources.
Discuss methods of assessment and evaluation, including exams and assignments.
Address concerns related to grading policies and ensure fairness and consistency.
Address concerns related to student behavior, harassment, or bullying.
Review strategies for maintaining a safe and secure campus environment.
Discuss mechanisms for reporting and addressing student grievances.
Explore opportunities for student leadership and involvement in decision-making processes.
Discuss initiatives to promote student well-being and mental health support.
